column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Where do you draw your strength from ?
#Text=What ’s behind that question is when I was in law school I did a Chihuahua rescue and helped to save perhaps 15 to 20 dogs .
#Text=I thought it would be a great fulfilling thing , and it would be easy to do to host these animals while I read my law books .
#Text=Instead , it was grueling .
#Text=It ended up tearing me apart —
#Text=It does .
#Text=-- watching your film I thought , “ I would be a terrible investigator .
#Text=I would be like the guy in the movie who simply could n’t do it . ”

#Text=I saw a 14-pound dog that was raped by a man and her insides were torn up ; I had a dog who almost died on me because it had been so severely starved and beaten , and the only thing I could do to get it to survive was to take a syringe full of blended dog food liquidated with heavy cream and feed it while it bit my fingers .
#Text=It took its toll on me and it was one of the things that made me very down on humanity —
#Text=You ’re a good man .
#Text=But it was hurtful .
#Text=Yeah , it ’s very painful !
#Text=Where do you draw your strength to continue on and to not hate humanity ?
#Text=I definitely do n’t hate humanity , because I am one .
#Text=I think we ’re weak .
#Text=I think our species loves to think of itself as all important and knowing and clever ; and we ’re not .
#Text=Fundamentally , we like a chocolate soda and stay in bed late .
#Text=We like some rubbish on TV .
#Text=It ’s just the way we are .
#Text=If everyone could come to America from all over I think they would so they could all get fat and rich and do almost nothing , and collect unemployment .
#Text=Anyway , whatever .
#Text=Substitute something there . [ Laughs ]
#Text=Anthropologists have said that it is only human conceit that has separated us from the other apes ; for starters the apes .
#Text=Really , there is no such thing as a hominid .
#Text=They say there are hominids and pongids , and we ’re probably all in it together and that we are probably all the same taxa .
#Text=I see chimpanzees are very much like human beings , and they are very aggressive .
#Text=The males will go out together and hunt , and they ’ll take apart a Colobus monkey just for the fun of it , like a gang on the street .
#Text=The males will beat their chest and are full of testosterone , and they ’ll gang-bang the females , which happens every day if you read the newspaper .
#Text=And they are lazy .
#Text=If you put them in captivity they ’ll throw their feces at you , but they do n’t mean it !
#Text=That ’s just their nature ; it ’s not as if they sat there thinking this up .
#Text=It ’s their nature .
